resources.string: Congratulations on successfully registering your restaurant! We are excited that you have joined our community.!
Complete the information about your restaurant!
Filling out the details of your restaurant is important so that customers can easily find you and learn more about what you offer.
Adding a menu is crucial as it allows customers to explore your offerings and make informed dining choices, enhancing their overall experience.
Uploading photos is essential as it gives customers a visual insight into your restaurant\'s ambiance and dishes, making your establishment more appealing and inviting.
Now you can proceed to manage your restaurant within the app.
